name: TinyHunt
description:
TinyHunt

The Tiny RPG Hunting Game

TInyHunt is a small student project done as part of a course on Unity, it's a 2D-3D RPG game about hunting where you have to kill deer summoned by a pentagram. The game currently has no ending, so for now it's just about killing thousands of deer if you can.

Let us know if you are interested in the project and if we should continue working on it.

Control:

Right click: Aiming

Left click:shoot

qwerty: Move

E: Interact

Game Programmers 

Thomas RAULIN- SANCHES Alexandre- Nicolas MANACH
